backend/main.mo: Main actor handling maintenance mode, user profiles, and quote requests with admin authorization and new List-based quote storage.
backend/migration.mo: Migrates old Map-based quote requests to the new List format while adding createdBy fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking updated quote storage changes to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file summarizing the purpose of each frontend source file, including pages, hooks, and assets.
frontend/CUSTOM_DOMAIN_DEPLOYMENT.md: Guide describing how to deploy the app to a custom domain on the Internet Computer.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling with OKLCH variables and theme definitions for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file loading the React app with favicon and root mount point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level app component managing navigation, maintenance mode gating, and page rendering.
frontend/src/components/AdminAuthGate.ts: Wrapper component enforcing admin authentication and showing appropriate login or denial states.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer displaying company info, services, contact details, service area, and copyright.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Navigation header with desktop/mobile menus, admin links, and phone CTA using auth state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAuth.ts: Checks if the authenticated user is an admin by querying the actor and exposes admin auth state.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminQuotes.ts: Loads all quote requests for admins using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, and identity state through a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useMaintenanceMode.ts: Fetches and updates maintenance‑mode status via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Submits quote requests to the backend and invalidates related queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom theming with light/dark color variables and layout utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App bootstrap wiring React Query and Internet Identity providers around the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Admin login UI using Internet Identity with sign‑in, sign‑out, and status display.
frontend/src/pages/BeforeAfterGalleryPag: Empty page placeholder for a before/after gallery.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the home page with hero content, feature highlights, and navigation actions for calling or requesting a quote.
frontend/src/pages/MaintenancePage.tsx: Displays a maintenance notice with contact info and provides a button to navigate to the admin login.
frontend/src/pages/OtherJobsPage.tsx: Shows a grid of additional services with icons, descriptions, and images, along with supporting header sections.
frontend/src/pages/QuoteRequestPage.tsx: Implements a quote request form with validation, submission handling, and success messaging.
frontend/src/pages/ViewQuotesPage.tsx: Admin-only page that lists submitted quotes, handles loading and error states, and provides maintenance mode controls.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON file describing project requirements, architectural notes, known issues, and desired updates for the Pane Pros of Plano website.
